This makes delivery more 
complicated. Your obstetrician 
and midwife will talk to you 
about the best and safest way 
for your breech baby to be 
born. You will be advised to 
have your baby in hospital.
External cephalic version
You	will	usually	be	offered	
the option of an external 
cephalic version (ECV). This is 
when pressure is put on your 
abdomen to try to turn the 
baby to a head down position.
